title: tatvam asi enru
sahitya:
tatvam sai enrushollit-tANDavam shei manamE shuddha saccidAnanda jyOti mayam aduvE


anupallavi

  inda matham anda matham enr-alaivadEnO bandhamillAp-paramporuLaip-pAr adu nI uLLE


caraNam    unnaiyanri nI aduvE ulagamadan kOvil annai pitA yAvum adE aruLinilE uNarvAm
  uLLattil uLLaduvE ulaguyirin virivAm veLLattil minsAra vEgam adaip-pOlum
 taLarAda dhyAnam vaLar tava yOgam adanAl vaLarAnma nEyamurum vaiyamellAm onrAm
aghAya mIngaLaip-pOl Aruyirin kUTTam Ekarasa jyOtiyilE iNaivadarkkE OTTam
evvUrum emmUrE evvevarum yAmE evvuyirum eppeyerum evaiyum oru niraivE
tatvam asi enru shollit-tANDavam shei manamE
